response.overview: Hour in Hell tells the story of a terrifying experience on a bus. A group of criminals gets on the bus and causes chaos. They fire guns, scaring everyone, and act violently toward the passengers. The people on the bus are trapped, feeling helpless and afraid. This episode shows how quickly safety can disappear and how such events can leave a lasting impact on those who experience them. It’s a powerful reminder of the need for justice and the strength people show in difficult times
response.title: Hour in Hell
